H1.text: what type of government does russia have 2010. Democracy

H2.text: what type of government does russia have 2010. Authoritarian Regime

H3.text: what type of government does russia have 2010. Republic

A4.text: Since the turn of the century, Russia's political system has been dominated by Vladimir Putin, under whom the country has experienced democratic backsliding and has been transformed into an authoritarian regime.

A5.text: Russia, by constitution, is a symmetric federal republic with a semi-presidential system

A6.text: The new Russian Constitution was adopted in 1993. It gained legitimacy through its bicameral legislature, an independent judiciary, the position of the president and the prime minister, and democratic features.

A7.text: the president appoints the prime minister.
